brsw5e.diceEnabled.name: Enable Better Rolls
brsw5e.diceEnabled.hint: Enables the improved dice outputs for SW5e. Affects all ability checks, saving throws, items, spells, and features on the sheet. Requires reopening the sheet.
brsw5e.queryAdvantageEnabled.name: Query for (Dis)Advantage
brsw5e.queryAdvantageEnabled.hint: Adds a Query for Advantage/Normal/Disadvantage roll types. Ctrl + Shift may still be used.
brsw5e.rollButtonsEnabled.name: Add Roll Buttons to Sheet
brsw5e.rollButtonsEnabled.hint: Adds buttons to items, spells, and features in the sheet, which display when the item is expanded. May be incompatible with the Item Sheet Buttons mod. Requires reopening the sheet.
brsw5e.imageButtonEnabled.name: Make Item Image Auto-roll
brsw5e.imageButtonEnabled.hint: When clicking on an item's image, output a Better Roll message to chat instead of the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.
brsw5e.quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.na: Quick Roll Description Enabled by Default
brsw5e.quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.hi: If enabled, weapons and tools will have their descriptions show by default on quick rolls. Only affects new weapons and tools, as other item types already have descriptions enabled by default.
brsw5e.defaultRollArt.name: Use Default Art
brsw5e.defaultRollArt.hint: Determines which art is used by default for ability checks and saving throws. If this is not available (or is the default mystery man icon), it will use the other icon instead.
brsw5e.damageContextEnabled.name: Damage Context Labels
brsw5e.damageContextEnabled.hint: Allows entering context for damage labels, which precede the damage type. Only works on Better Rolls.
brsw5e.contextReplacesTitle.name: Context Replaces Title Label
brsw5e.contextReplacesTitle.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage roll's title label, such as "Damage" or "Healing", it will replace it.
brsw5e.contextReplacesDamage.name: Context Replaces Damage Type
brsw5e.contextReplacesDamage.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage type label, it will replace it.
brsw5e.rollTitlePlacement.name: Show Roll Title Labels
brsw5e.rollTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a non-damage roll's title, such as "Attack", appear.
brsw5e.damageTitlePlacement.name: Show Damage Title Labels
brsw5e.damageTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a damage roll's title, such as "Damage", appears.
brsw5e.damageRollPlacement.name: Show Damage Type Labels
brsw5e.damageRollPlacement.hint: Determines where the damage type label is placed, relative to a damage roll.
brsw5e.altSecondaryEnabled.name: Alt-Click Image for Secondary Roll
brsw5e.altSecondaryEnabled.hint: When Alt-clicking on an item's image, output a second Better Roll message which can be configured separately per-item. Overwrites ability to bypass with default chat output.
brsw5e.chatDamageButtonsEnabled.name: Enable Chat Damage Buttons
brsw5e.chatDamageButtonsEnabled.hint: Renders buttons on Better Rolls damage rolls that apply damage to selected tokens. Requires refreshing Foundry.
brsw5e.playRollSounds.name: Enable Roll Sounds
brsw5e.playRollSounds.hint: Plays a dice-rolling sound when a Better Rolls message is sent to chat. Wlll not play if Maestro's Item Track are enabled.
brsw5e.hideDC.name: Hide Save DCs
brsw5e.hideDC.hint: Determines if the DC is hidden on save DC buttons on Better Rolls.
brsw5e.d20Mode.name: d20 Mode
brsw5e.d20Mode.hint: Determines how attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws are shown.
brsw5e.d20Mode.choices.3: ゴゴ Triple Threat ゴゴ
brsw5e.critBehavior.name: Critical Damage
brsw5e.critBehavior.hint: Determines how critical damage is calculated.
brsw5e.critString.name: Critical Indicator
brsw5e.critString.hint: Determines how criticals are labeled. Appears as text to the right of the critical damage roll. Only works on Better Rolls.
brsw5e.error.noSelectedActor: Must have a character selected to use this macro!
brsw5e.error.noKnownItemOnActor: does not own an item named
brsw5e.error.noActorWithId: No actor is known with that ID
brsw5e.error.noActorWithName: No actor is known with that name
brsw5e.error.noItemWithId: No item is known with that ID on actor
brsw5e.error.noChargesLeft: This item has run out of charges!
brsw5e.error.autoDestroy: The {name} disappears as its last charge is consumed.
brsw5e.settings.critDamage.hint: Extra Critical Damage to apply when at least one damage is rolled
brsw5e.settings.quickRollsAltSubLabel: (When holding Alt during a quick roll)
brsw5e.settings.label: Label
brsw5e.querying.title: What type of roll?
brsw5e.chat.damageButtons.fullDamage.hin: Click to apply full damage to selected token(s).
brsw5e.chat.damageButtons.halfDamage.hin: Click to apply half damage to selected token(s).
brsw5e.chat.damageButtons.doubleDamage.h: Click to apply double damage to selected token(s).
brsw5e.chat.damageButtons.healing.hint: Click to apply full healing to selected token(s).
